Title: Westworld
Actors: Yul Brynner, Richard Benjamin, James Brolin, Norman Bartold
Plot: An amusement park for rich vacationers. The park provides its customers a way to live out their fantasies through the use of robots that provide anything they want. Two of the vacationers choose a wild west adventure. However, after a computer breakdown, they find that they are now being stalked by a rogue robot gun-slinger.
